short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add some flavour to crucial DND keywords!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on searches for specified keywords on dndbeyond website and modifies the style of these keywords so the whole text is more readable. No more reading 5 paragraphs to learn the action DC check.
